short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modern - Take your browser up a notch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to set your New Tab Search to an Modern themed background.

Your search provider will be changed to Microsoft Bing. See and set beautiful background images. Upgrade your browser to our new modern tab today!

Choose from one of several Modern themed images. These images are all copyright free from https://unsplash.com.
